• Made it easier to discover information in the app with iOS search

● Improved article presentation
● Minor bug fixes and optimizations

In previous versions:
● Bookmark favorites & read articles offline
● Find 'Near Me' articles
● Added locations & much more
● Share directly from notificat

● Minor bug fixes and under the hood improvements.

• New, easy-to-use interface & layout
• Predictive search and predictive recommendations to make exploring even easier!
• Improved content sufficiency - more locations added, now covering 300+ destinations
• Video content more easily discover

Updates to help you book travel that's good and makes you feel good in 2021. Easily find recommendations for spot-on places to stay and experiences hand-picked by travel experts and local insiders, all bookable on Culture Trip
